content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius regional district court the court has made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between the applicant and the defendant the applicant is awarded an apartment dwelling house and is required to pay the defendant compensation for their share of the property the defendant is awarded ownership of several vehicles and will receive financial compensation from the claimant the court has also declared that a debt owed to the defendant by a hunting club is the defendants personal obligation the text discusses various articles from the civil code related to matrimonial property and explains the progress of the divorce case the applicant is seeking to dissolve the marriage and retain their surname while the defendant will retain theirs the court will determine the division of the matrimonial property based on market values the applicant is responsible for certain costs and fees and the defendant is ordered to pay the applicants legal costs and postage costs to the state

metadata.cost: 75.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 13.52 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant; 631.50 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the applicant
